title: The Herd
occurrences: You have a telegram from Ankara. They want the herd.
It's a deal. Make it quick. Your herd will be in Ankara soon.
You'll leave. Right at the time we deliver the herd?
This is Veysikans' last chance. We'll take clan's herd...
If she comes, we'll be ruined. The herd is clan's last hope.
We need 4 wagons. The herd will be in wagons 2 hours before.
You go to the station with the herd, and return back...
My gazelle, be patient. We won't go back to the herd.
